title: [Large-Scale] Advanced Language Instructional Design Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language education theory and practical experience
context.additional_context: Project execution using smartphone-based collaboration tools, with a mentorship system led by industry experts.

learning_goals: Learners can explain language education design processes applying learning science principles with over 80% accuracy
Learners can independently develop instructional design plans for real-world language education scenarios through project-based assessment
Learners can produce and share educational materials using smartphone-based collaboration tools in limited-technology environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
